mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.duration AS "duration", a.url AS "url", a.code AS "code", a.tag AS "tag", a.catalog AS "catalog", a.status AS "status", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", b.id AS "resourseType.id", b.name AS "resourseType.name", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN resourse_type b on b.id=a.catalog
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO vedio( id, name, duration, url, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, code, tag, catalog ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{duration}, #{url}, #{status}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{code}, #{tag}, #{catalog} )
mapper.update: UPDATE vedio SET name = #{name}, duration = #{duration}, url = #{url}, status = #{status}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, code= #{code}, tag= #{tag}, catalog= #{resourseType.id}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
